name: Jake Gyllenhaal
role: Actor, Producer, Camera and Electrical Department
summary:
Jake Gyllenhaal. Actor: Nightcrawler. Jake Gyllenhaal was born on December 19, 1980 in Los Angeles, California as Jacob Benjamin Gyllenhaal, the son of producer/screenwriter Naomi Foner and director Stephen Gyllenhaal, and the younger brother of actress Maggie Gyllenhaal. He is of Ashkenazi Jewish (mother) and Swedish, English, and German (father) descent.

He made his movie debut at 11 in City Slickers (1991). From the late 1990s through the early 2000s, he...
awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar | 36 wins & 106 nominations total
